title: WORKTERRA's Flexible, Mobile BenAdmin Application Selected by Cheeseman Transport
text:
WORKTERRA BenAdmin delivers Cheeseman Transport a user-friendly, secure and mobile accessible application for the benefit administration and enrollment of its growing workforce
(PRWEB) September 28, 2015
WORKTERRA, the easy-to-use, quickly implemented cloud-based benefits administration and talent management system for companies of any size, today announced the addition of Cheeseman Transport to its WORKTERRA BenAdmin client base. Cheeseman is delivered a flexible and simplified benefit administration and enrollment application built not only engage employees in their benefit plan elections, but to also deliver all the tools needed for HR administrators to manage new hire enrollment, life events, and Affordable Care Act (ACA) compliance.
Designed to accommodate a workforce on the go, WORKTERRA BenAdmin offers Cheeseman employees instant access anytime, anywhere from any mobile device. Proprietary mobile applications for iPhone, Android phones, iPad and Android tablets allow employees to stay connected and up to speed on their benefit plan elections, even while states away. WORKTERRA BenAdmin empowers employees to learn about, understand, and explore their benefit options with the help of various decision support tools. These interactive tools such as benefit calculators, paycheck modeling, and side-by-side plan comparisons are designed to assist employees in selecting the benefit plan that is best for them.
WORKTERRA's flexible and streamlined BenAdmin application is designed to eliminate time wasted on daunting tasks and allows HR staff to focus on more important activities within the organization. WORKTERRA BenAdmin delivers Cheeseman administrators a single place to manage employee benefit elections, set payroll schedules, and manage life events throughout the year. Advanced reporting capabilities allow administrators to quickly and easily generate any standard or unique report in real-time providing a simple way to track and monitor benefit election progress.
About Cheeseman Transport - Cheeseman Transport, founded in 1946 has corporate offices in Fort Recovery, OH and terminal operations in Fort Recovery, OH, Greer, SC, Greencastle, IN, and East Windsor, CT. Cheeseman specializes in Load-to-Ride, Less-than-Truckload, Truckload, Dedicated, Distribution and Expedited services. The fleet operates 300 trucks and services the entire continental U.S. and Canada. For more information visit https://cheeseman.com
About WORKTERRA- WORKTERRA makes HCM easier, less confusing, and more efficient -- no matter the size of your company, today or tomorrow. It's a super-easy-to-use, quickly implemented, and extremely flexible benefits and talent management system that is smart, fast, and sharp. WORKTERRA is a cloud-based technology that's built from the inside out on a platform we designed, own, and continue to enrich through our innovation and passion. All of which ensures easy and fast configuration and enhancements. And because WORKTERRA is a unified system with every module on board, there's no outsourcing to worry about, no third-party apps to depend on. WORKTERRA won't leave you in the lurch after commitments are made or fall short under complex situations. Now, transform the way you manage benefits and people.
Headquartered in Pleasanton, Calif., WORKTERRA is online at workterra.com .
